io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.general.service.impl.rest

Class SecurityRestServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.general.service.impl.rest.SecurityRestServiceImpl

  • The security REST service provides access to the csrf token, the authenticated user's meta-data. Furthermore, it provides functionality to check permissions and roles of the authenticated user.
    Author:
    Malte Brunnlieb

      • getCsrfToken

        @Produces(value="application/json")
@GET
@Path(value="/csrftoken/")
@PermitAll
public org.springframework.security.web.csrf.CsrfToken getCsrfToken(@Context
                                                                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                       @Context
                                                                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Retrieves the CSRF token from the server session.
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest to retrieve the current session from
        response - HttpServletResponse to send additional information
        Returns:
        the Spring Security CsrfToken
